title: Inverse Worst Strategy (Curse Avoidance)
mechanism: META-STRATEGY: What is the WORST possible strategy? Find markets where it would trigger, and AVOID those markets. The idea: if we can identify 'cursed' market patterns, we can exclude them and improve edge on remaining markets.

proposed_signal.condition: Identify characteristics of markets that ALWAYS lose (e.g., small trades + high leverage + specific times)

data_requirements: all available fields - need to find the curse pattern
price_proxy_risk: UNKNOWN - depends on what pattern emerges
